comment.p: Emulates Capcom Play System and SNK Neo-Geo games.

revision.comment: Uploaded dats for ACE v1.9 (added 46 CPS2 games all but vampj, vsavj, xmcotaj and 19xx, msh, qndream ssf2, ssf2t with their clones, added 1 NeoGeo game).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.8 (added 3 games and added ng-sm1.rom into all NeoGeo games).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.7a (added 5 new Neo-Geo games and 2 new CPS-2 games).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.6 (added KOF94, Metal Slug 2 and Metal Slug X).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.5 (added 6 games; Neo-Geo and System-16).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.4 (added 5 games).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.3 (added 8 games).
Uploaded dats for ACE v1.2b (added Capcom Sports Club and Street Fighter Alpha).
